Posts.Title: Any Scottish ladies out there?

Posts.Content: Hello there x Iam from Glasgow...... been looking for somebody to from Scotland to..... i have her 2 + breast cancer and going through chemo...... i get my 2nd chemo on weds........ what stage are you at? iv added you as a friend x x hope your keeping your chin up x x
